results.title: Simvastatin inhibits goblet cell hyperplasia and lung arginase in a mouse model of allergic asthma: a novel treatment for airway remodeling?
results.text_hl: Inhibition of @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoid_Tumor</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002276 @@@goblet cell hyperplasia@@@ by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ was @CHEMICAL_Mevalonic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008798 @@@mevalonate@@@-dependent.

citations.NLM: Zeki AA, Bratt JM, Rabowsky M, Last JA, Kenyon NJ. Simvastatin inhibits goblet cell hyperplasia and lung arginase in a mouse model of allergic asthma: a novel treatment for airway remodeling? Transl Res. 2010 Dec;156(6):335-49. PMID: 21078495
citations.BibTeX: @article{21078495, title={Simvastatin inhibits goblet cell hyperplasia and lung arginase in a mouse model of allergic asthma: a novel treatment for airway remodeling?}, author={Zeki AA and Bratt JM and Rabowsky M and Last JA and Kenyon NJ}, journal={Transl Res}, volume={156}, number={6}, pages={335-49}}

results.title: Evaluation of Simvastatin and Bone Marrow-Derived Mesenchymal Stem Cell Combination Therapy on Airway Remodeling in a Mouse Asthma Model.
results.text_hl: Combination therapy improved all measured parameters higher than @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@. @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoid_Tumor</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002276 @@@Goblet cell hyperplasia@@@ and subepithelial @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@ were also decreased in combination therapy group.

citations.NLM: Mohammadian M, Sadeghipour HR, Kashani IR, Jahromi GP, Omidi A, Nejad AK, Golchoobian R, Boskabady MH. Evaluation of Simvastatin and Bone Marrow-Derived Mesenchymal Stem Cell Combination Therapy on Airway Remodeling in a Mouse Asthma Model. Lung. 2016 Oct;194(5):777-85. PMID: 27161569
citations.BibTeX: @article{27161569, title={Evaluation of Simvastatin and Bone Marrow-Derived Mesenchymal Stem Cell Combination Therapy on Airway Remodeling in a Mouse Asthma Model.}, author={Mohammadian M and Sadeghipour HR and Kashani IR and Jahromi GP and Omidi A and Nejad AK and Golchoobian R and Boskabady MH}, journal={Lung}, volume={194}, number={5}, pages={777-85}}
